note:
Mild-mannered developer by day, oral storyteller, student of folklore & lover of traditional folktales, self-employed ghost tour guide in the historic village of Haworth in his real life. Feral Druid by inclination, British Druid Order for fellowship.

Reason for living: storytelling, folktales.

ASD. If I misread the room, please tell me.

Sober as fuck. Not a judgement on the choices of others.


Posts deleted after 2 weeks
